title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 12.2 - Precautions to be observed for the prevention of purulent conjunctivitis of the newborn
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 12.2 - Precautions to be observed for the prevention of purulent conjunctivitis of the newborn

State Regulations

It shall be the duty of the attending physician, licensed midwife, licensed nurse or other authorized provider in attendance at a delivery to place into the eyes of the infant, on delivery, an agent effective for preventing purulent conjunctivitis of the newborn, such as tetracycline or erythromycin eye preparation or a one percent solution of nitrate of silver.
